column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our first round was: bacon wrapped dates
column3: baked goat cheese in tomato sauce
column4: and the beef medallions with potato chips. The bacon wrapped dates had SUCH great flavor! All bacon-y from the first bite
column5: but the finish was with the deep sweetness of the date. It's a great flavor combo. The jalapeno aioli was absolutely wonderful with the calamari. It had a nice heat to it
column6: which I would expect! The beef medallions were succulent and had a little bit of bleu cheese on them
column8: so it wasn't overpowering. The potato chips were fine
column9: but I'm not a plain potato chip person. The goat cheese came with some crostinis to spread it on and they were perfectly crisp without being too hard to bite into.
